item.title: How to Setup Gh Pages
item.description: GitHub repo creation Create git repo in github. For this example we will use “gh-pages”. Setup Install hugo: https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing Create site: hugo new site gh-pages cd gh-pages Initialize repo: git init Add theme as submodule, e.g. git submodule add https://github.com/mtn/cocoa-eh-hugo-theme themes/cocoa-eh-hugo-theme Copy config.toml template cp themes/cocoa-eh-hugo-theme/exampleSite/config.toml . Modify config.toml to include: baseurl = "https://pages.github.com/<username>/gh-pages/" ## OR org gh pages is enabled *and* domain has been verified, then use baseurl = "https://doxmx.
